text: Ust, ki sumoro dar xuski va dar darjo sajr medihad. To on goh ki dar kistiho hastand va ʙodi muvofiq ʙa harakatason meovarad, sodmonand. Cun tufon faro rasad va mavc az har su ʙar onho rezad, cunon pindorand, ki dar muhosirai mavc qaror giriftaand, (jaqin mekunand, ki halok mesavand), Allohro az rui ixlos va jagonagi ʙixonand, ki agar moro az in xatar ʙirahoni, hatman, az sukrguzoron xohem ʙud
